definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: Dai Ashi is a great exercise in Aikido to learn how to defend against multiple attackers.
sentences.chinese: 阿戴是一個很好的鍛鍊學習合氣道如何抵禦多種攻擊。

sentences.english: In Aikido martial arts Shomen Uchi is an overhead strike defense.
sentences.chinese: 在合氣道武術Shomen宇智是國防開銷罷工。

sentences.english: Changing the line of attack an attacker is crucial in advanced Aikido.
sentences.chinese: 更改攻擊線攻擊者是至關重要的先進合氣道。

sentences.english: All those, you see, like, Aikido, Korean Karate, and on.
sentences.chinese: 所有這些，你明白，像合氣道，朝鮮的空手道等等。
